name:
Ever Oasis™:
Update
description:
An update for Ever Oasis™ is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of Ever Oasis™ should download the update. This will update the software to Version 1.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
